features: Perfect Single Serve One Cup Coffee Maker: Our coffee maker mini is the solution for the option to enjoy two ways of making coffee; all you need is to add water to a water tank, put a single cup or ground coffee, and in just a few minutes enjoy a hot coffee!!

Quick Brewing System And Automatic Power Off: A simple coffee machine with one touch button and a powerful 1000w motor allows the water to warm to high temperature; enjoy a delicious single cup coffee maker or coffee in the traditional way in 2-3 minutes.

Compact And Small Size: Our single serve coffee maker is a perfect small coffee maker for home, office, hotel, apartment, caravan, or school. Especially for limited counter space or travel, you can take it anywhere and enjoy a hot coffee anytime!!

Best Pod Coffee Maker: The single coffee maker will be most convenient for cleaning and storage and is made from environmentally safe materials. Our removable drip tray is easy to clean, and a removable ground coffee filter comes with the single serve coffee maker.
Customer Support: Your Mixpresso pod coffee maker is covered under our 1-year warranty.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Mixpresso is one of the biggest brands in coffee makers & coffee accessories! This coffe maker is one of our best sellers in single-serve brewers you can enjoy all tipes of your favorite coffee and brew it with this amazing single brew coffee maker, It's a unique k cup coffee machine made of top materials, We offer our coffee maker k cup at an amazing sale, so that you can enjoy a good & cheap coffee maker!
One Cup Coffee Maker That Uses K Cups

Why Choose Mixpresso Single Cup Coffee Maker K Cup Compatible? 2-in-1 Coffee Maker Brewer: Our single serve coffee maker with a 2-way brewing style lets you choose ground coffee or coffee pods to brew the coffee you choose. Enjoy your first cup of coffee in the morning to accompany you daily.14 Oz Water Tank: The clear reservoir of this coffee maker with K cup combo has a large capacity scale from 6oz to 14oz. You can add water according to your needs. It is suitable for family members of different ages, whether children or older adults.Simple One-button Operation: You will enjoy delicious coffee with our k-cup coffee makers by simply pressing the appropriate button. Just select the Capsules/Ground filter basket.Fast Brewing Single Coffee Maker: No matter what type of ground or capsule coffee you want to brew with the single serve instant pot coffee maker, it will take less than 2-3 minutes to make 14oz hot coffee, which saves your time significantly.

Thank You! We warmly welcome you to our club of espresso enthusiasts and hope you will continue to enjoy our coffee machines and our nespresso compatible pods in the future. If you want to discover more about Mixpresso, please visit our website at Mixpresso.com

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It has stopped working May 7 2023. It was great while it lasted and we liked it’s smaller stature. May buy again after looking at other options.Update!! We washed it really well and it started working again. Still using it !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sal from blue ridge GA
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought this small one cup coffee brewer for a friend of mine that is in the nursing home for her guest to brew a cup of coffee while they visiting her or I cab brew her a cup of coffee whenever she wants one it works great I have no problems with this coffee brewer it is good for an 8 oz cup of coffeeThe only downfall I have with this coffee maker is it says 6 8 10 or 12 oz it's too short for a 10-ounce so I use an 8 oz cup and the markings are inside the water reservoir that's hard to see but if you shine a flashlight in it you can see it but once you figure out how much coffee you need to put in your filter or what type of K-Cup you going to use you know by the first time how much water to put in for your 8 oz cup it makes a good tasting cup of coffee it's well worth the money and I recommend people to buy it if they want to have a little cup of coffee while they're watching a late show or what have you but if you're a coffee drinker not like me I just drink one cup of coffee every morning but if your a coffee drinker you have to have several cups I don't recommend you to buy it like I said it's just for an 8 oz cup of coffee it works very well like I said and I do recommend buying it it's well worth the money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not a great brewer
reviews.reviewText: So, there are three PROs for this brewer:1) It makes your coffee FAST.2) It's relatively easy to clean.3) It's very easy to use.Now for the CONs:1) Coffee isn't the hottest - after 10 minutes in a well-insulated mug it's already cooled down significantly. I drink my coffee over a 30-minute period, and I usually have to heat it up twice.2) Coffee doesn't taste good. It's weak, and there are usually some grounds at the bottom of my cup. I think it brews it TOO fast, so the grounds aren't given enough time to steep. I'm using the same batch of K-cups from my last brewer (that died), so it's not the cups themselves.3) Product is cheaply made. The plastic on this brewer is definitely of a much inferior quality to my last brewer (Sboly single-cup brewer, about $15 more than this one). It's thinner, and just doesn't feel like a quality product. It weighs *nothing*, like I can dangle it off of my index finger easier than one of my coffee mugs.4) Not much room for a good-sized mug. I can't use any of my larger mugs in this - the largest that fits is a 12-oz. The platform the mug sits on is really high and the cup vessel is really low, so you've got only 5" for your mug. I usually brew 11 oz. and add creamer, so this is an issue. I brew it in my 12-oz mug, then have to pour it in another to add creamer so it doesn't overflow the mug when I tip it to drink.5) They give you a rubber drip tray that sits on top of the platform but it's useless. It's pretty thick for starters, so I can't use it with the mug (because the mug won't fit) and it hardly holds any spill over (my last brewer held up to 6 oz) because it's pretty much solid with a few grooves.6) It sounds like it's going to take off from my kitchen counter. It's pretty...forceful. And I think that's part of the reason I'm getting grounds in my coffee: it's trying to blast through so quickly to get you the coffee fast that it's just not brewing correctly and taking grounds along for the ride.Overall, I'm sorry I bought it as it was a waste of my money. It works, but not well. I've got coffee, but I don't enjoy drinking it. While it fits on my limited counter space, it doesn't fit most of my mugs. :(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pros and Cons
reviews.reviewText: Great little coffee maker. Perfect for a one cup a day. No mess! I have a much larger Keurig which I have loved for many years, but I don’t really need the size. They both have one cup convenience, but the mixpresso is so nice and small. I got it for the motorhome, but I may get another for home. It’s my 3rd one for motorhome. Most of the smaller one cup machines are larger than this one, cheaply made and don’t last. This Mixpresso seems to be of higher quality right out of the box. Beware: I have several of the taller and narrower coffee mugs and some do not fit. The tallest cup you can have is about 4 3/4 “, but you can add about a half inch if you take the bottom tray out. Won’t fit the taller travel mugs. Also, It is louder than I like as its heating the water. I can live with that, given the overall quality!It is solid and well built. I’ve timed it twice, and it took about 3 1/2 minutes to heat water and make a cup of hot water for first rinse and test. It took under 3 min for next cup with coffee......Probably because it was warmed up! Overall, if you’re looking for small, convenient, single cup brewing, this is your machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for single cup on the run.
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use...use reg K cup or the fill baskets with reg coffee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good Things-Bad Things
reviews.reviewText: Good: The red one is adorableGood: Small and light-weightGood: Beverage is ready in two minutesGood: Can use K-Cup, ground coffee, loose tea, cocoa (use cocoa powder, put 6oz of water in maker and 6oz microwaved milk in cup)Good/Bad: Upon being brewed, the beverage is the perfect temperature to drink right away--good if you want to guzzle it down quickly before heading out the door, but if you'd like to sip really hot coffee, you'll need to microwave your cup of coffee after it's been brewed.Bad(ish): You must fill it with water every single time and rinse out the filter each time (unless you use a K-cup)Bad(ish): If your cup is taller than 4.5", it won't fit. Well, a 5" cup will fit, but don't fill it all the way because you'll need to tip it to remove it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my grandson for Christmas. Works well. Makes exactly the size cup he wants and can use any pod or the reusable filter that came with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for older people
reviews.reviewText: I use this coffee maker every morning. I live alone and don't need more that a cup at a time... so this was the perfect answer!
Nice little machine. Makes a cup very quickly. Takes very little space. Easy to use!

reviews.reviewTitle: Best little machine in the West!!!
reviews.reviewText: This is the third one I have bought. I like to have an extra one on hand. The last 'extra' one I gave to my daughter...and she LOVES it. So I ordered this red one. One of the best features is how small it is. It takes up a quarter the space other machines take. And it makes a cup of coffee really quickly! I love it!

reviews.reviewTitle: WHAT A PC. OF Sh$t spend a bit more for a real one
reviews.reviewText: it lasted 1 week and 4 days and stopped brewing coffee was never really hot it was barely warm, i spent $16.00 more and got a keurig mini and it 10 times the machine, the max expresso machine leaked water it made a mess all the time felt cheaply made. spend a bit more coin and get a quality coffee [1 cup] machine
facile à utiliser mais un café sans goût réel.... genre simple café pas expresso..
